prompt: Generate realistic text messages that represent non-spam (ham) content. These messages should reflect a broad spectrum of everyday communication, including personal conversations, legitimate business or service notifications, casual updates, and automated alerts. Vary the tone (friendly, professional, neutral, concerned), language style (informal chats, formal announcements, concise or detailed), and topics (meeting or appointment reminders, family or friend check-ins, order or delivery confirmations, bank transaction alerts, community or event updates). Include diverse formats like quick one-word replies, detailed explanations, friendly greetings, or automated system messages (e.g., OTP codes, subscription reminders). Ensure the content simulates authentic, non-malicious communication across different contexts, relationships, and platforms, avoiding any deceptive or promotional undertones.
response:
Hey! Just wanted to check in and see how you’re doing today.  
Reminder: Your dentist appointment is scheduled for Thursday at 2 PM.  
Your Amazon order has shipped! It should arrive by the end of the week.  
Can we reschedule our meeting to next Wednesday? Let me know what works for you.  
Just a quick note: the event starts at 6 PM tomorrow, don’t forget!  
Hi Mom, just finished my exam! I think it went well.  
Your bank alert: a transaction of $50 was made at the grocery store.  
Looking forward to our dinner tonight! What time should I pick you up?  
Don't forget, we have a family reunion on Saturday at the park.  
Your OTP for logging in is 123456.  
Hey, are we still on for the movie this weekend?  
Just a heads up, the power will be out from 9 AM to 1 PM for maintenance.  
Thanks for your help with the project! I really appreciate it.  
Hi there, your subscription will renew on the 15th.  
I’m really sorry to hear about your loss. I’m here if you need anything.  
Reminder: the deadline for the report is next Friday.  
Your package has been delivered! Check your front porch.  
Let’s catch up soon! How about coffee next week?  
Your flight is confirmed for 10:30 AM on Tuesday.  
Congratulations! You've been selected for the next phase of the interview.  
Just checking in to see if you need any help with the move this weekend.  
Thanks for the birthday wishes! It was a great day.  
Your appointment with the financial advisor is set for next Monday.  
Hey, can you send me the notes from yesterday’s meeting?  
Don't forget to bring your ID for the event tonight!  
I’m really excited for our trip next month!  
Your utility bill is due soon; please make sure to pay by the end of the week.  
I heard back from the publisher; they want to meet next week to discuss the manuscript.  
Looking forward to our hike on Saturday!  
Your reminder: the car needs an oil change soon.  
Thanks for picking up the groceries! You’re a lifesaver.  
Just wanted to say I'm proud of you for finishing that project!  
Hey, can you confirm if the meeting is still on for tomorrow?  
Your gym membership will expire soon; don't forget to renew!  
Can’t wait to see you at the concert next month!  
Your account settings have been successfully updated.  
I found a great recipe! Can I share it with you?  
Thanks for the invite to the wedding! I’ll be there!  
Your pizza order is being prepared and will be delivered soon.  
I’m thinking of trying that new café downtown. Want to join?  
Your package will arrive between 3 PM and 5 PM today.  
Just a reminder: the deadline for the scholarship application is next week.  
Hope you’re having a great day! Let’s chat later.  
Your feedback on the survey is valuable to us, thank you!  
I’ll be out of the office until Monday. Please contact Sarah for urgent matters.  
Excited for the game this weekend! Let’s go team!  
Your subscription has been successfully canceled; we’re sorry to see you go.  
Thanks for your prompt response! Looking forward to our collaboration.  
Just checking if you received my last email about the project update.  
Let’s plan a weekend getaway soon; we need some time off!  
Your order is ready for pickup at the store.
